main event: Multiple round, multi-colored objects were observed flying in a diamond formation over Pueblo, Colorado in September 1956.
interesting points: The objects were described as approximately 15 multi-colored lights (red, green, blue) that flew in a definite pattern slightly higher than jet aircraft altitude.
The lights were spread out in a diamond formation, equally spaced from each other.
The lights dimmed and brightened in sequence, almost as if blinking, as they proceeded on a southeast course, steadily and silently.
The lights appeared to be solid, not blinking lights on an aircraft, and there was no sound associated with them.
The sighting lasted for approximately 3 and a half minutes.
